title: Rate My Station
name: Rate My Station
description:
A Map by Ideabuzz

With the high price of gasoline the search to save a few pennies a gallon does not make sense. Neither do boycotts or other feeble attempts at manipulating price. This map is dedicated to obtaining the best value for money already being spent. 

Sick of no window washing equipment? Miss the full service guy that would show you your dip stick from the convience of your driver's seat? Then this map is for you!

properties.name: Mobil Station
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzAverage quality station. You have to pay for air. Getting in only works when headed north on Lake of West on the freeway frontage road. Very difficult to get back on the freeway once in the station. Better to head south on Lake and go to the Union station or coninue West to another Mobil at Fair Oaks.

properties.name: Mobil Station
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzAverage saion with new mini-mart. No repair services. Easier to get into an back on freeway than Lake ave.

properties.name: Mobil Station
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzMobil StationAverage station with easy access to and from freeway.

properties.name: Mobile Sation
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzVery small station that is hard t get in and out of and has short hours. Very well kept in a high end shopping area.

properties.name: Mobile Station
properties.description: Posted by Ideabuzz 1790 East Orange Grove Blvd Pasadena CACheaper gas than same brand north of the freeway, clean station, repair and smog service, very small amount of snacks and lots of soap in the window washing bucket.

properties.name: Sport Chalet
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzLa Canada, CAThis marker should be at the corner of Foothill Blvd and Angeles Crest Highway. It\'s not a gas station now but the service is great, for camping and skiing equipment. This station was converted into the rental hut for Sport Chalet many years ago.

properties.name: Teale Square Auto
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzBroadway & Victoria St, Somerville, MAI use this gas station for several reasons. The main reason is that it is the closest one to my house and I am a total sucker for convenience. The gas is usually a couple cents cheaper than the other local places. It\'s a full service gas station and the people who work here always seem to be in a good mood, which I think is a sign of good management.They also have a car repair garage here, but i have been fortunate not have had an opportunity to try it out. I did buy cigarettes here late one night and was impressed by their display of post cards and holiday greetings from loyal customers. Generally, the place gives off a great vibe. No frills.Lines can be a drag in the rush hours.Full service.

properties.name: Union 76 Station
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzClean station with long hours is convient when exiting the freeway. Repair service and cleanliness are at the top of the list. This station also features diesel and racing fuel!

properties.name: Very Clean Mobil Station
properties.description: Posted by IdeabuzzAverage looking station form the curb actually has extremely clean restrooms with flowers. Mini-mart is appropriatly stocked.
